parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: Set which page of the returned results to start displaying the query results. The default value is **1**, indicating that the display starts from the first page.

parameters.name: Extend
parameters.description: Whether the software name supports fuzzy search. To enable fuzzy search, set the value of this parameter to 1; other values or an empty value indicate that fuzzy search is not supported.

parameters.name: InstallTimeEnd
parameters.description: The timestamp when the software update ended. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: InstallTimeStart
parameters.description: The timestamp when the software update started. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the software to be queried.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
Used to mark the starting position for reading. Leave it blank to start from the beginning.

> For the first call, you do not need to fill this in; the response will include the NextToken for the second call, and each subsequent call's response will contain the NextToken for the next call.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Set the number of software asset fingerprint information items displayed per page during pagination. The default value is **10**, indicating that 10 items of software asset fingerprint information are displayed per page.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The installation path of the software.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or IP address of the server to be queried.

parameters.name: SoftwareVersion
parameters.description: The version information of the software.

parameters.name: UseNextToken
parameters.description:
Whether to use the NextToken method to pull asset list data. If this parameter is used, TotalCount will no longer be returned. Values:

- **true**: Use the NextToken method.
- **false**: Do not use the NextToken method.
